tempSupplier.summary: Temporary suppliers need to quickly complete their information and strictly distinguish the risk level of data modifications.

profileEdit.title: Profile Editing
profileEdit.description: Must be completed during registration; subsequent modifications must follow the following approval principles.

columns: Optimization Logic (Corresponding to Actual Scenario Requirements)

nonCritical: Supplier submits → Purchaser approves → Complete (no need for quality, management, or finance involvement)
Non-critical information (such as office address, contact person email/phone, delivery location) does not affect core cooperation, only requires purchaser confirmation of 'information authenticity'.
critical: Supplier submits → Purchaser initial review → Quality review (only when quality-related information is involved) → Procurement manager approval → Procurement director approval → Finance director approval → Complete

Critical information (bank account, payment terms/payment method, business registration number, quality system certification, invoice type) involves finance, quality, and responsibility definition, requiring multi-level linkage.
